scripts.istanbul: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha  -- -R spec --report lcov --compilers js:babel/register --ui qunit ./tests
scripts.coveralls: npm run compile; npm run istanbul  && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js; npm run clean
scripts.coverage: npm run compile; npm run istanbul; npm run clean
scripts.test: npm run compile; npm run mocha; npm run istanbul; npm run clean
